knowledge_panel.description: final fantasy vii is a 1997 role-playing video game developed by square for the playstation console. it is the seventh main installment in the final fantasy series. published in japan by square, it was released in other regions by sony computer entertainment and is the first in the main series with a pal release. wikipedia
